title: Data Engineering Fundamentals: Building Your Data Pipeline Expertise
description: Welcome to the world of Data Engineering! This course equips you with the foundational knowledge and tools to design, develop, and manage efficient data pipelines.

learning_outcomes.title: Data Warehousing and Big Data Concepts
learning_outcomes.content: Understand the concepts of data warehouses, data lakes, data ingestion, storage, and retrieval for large datasets.

learning_outcomes.title: Data Modeling
learning_outcomes.content: Learn to design effective data models that organize and structure your data for efficient analysis. Explore techniques like dimensional modeling and entity-relationship diagrams.

learning_outcomes.title: ETL/ELT Processing
learning_outcomes.content: Master the ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) and ELT (Extract, Load, Transform) processes for moving data between various systems.

learning_outcomes.title: Data Pipelines with Python
learning_outcomes.content: Utilize Python libraries like Pandas and Spark to build robust data pipelines that automate data movement and transformation.

learning_outcomes.title: Cloud Platforms for Data Engineering
learning_outcomes.content: Explore cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP for scalable data storage, processing, and analytics solutions.

learning_outcomes.title: Version Control and DataOps
learning_outcomes.content: Implement best practices for version control with Git and embrace DataOps principles for continuous integration and delivery of your data pipelines.

modules.title: Capstone Project
topics: Build a data pipeline for a specific use case
